name: Galactic Overlord
summary:
Unite the stars under one galactic empire!

Galactic Overlord is a simple yet addictive realtime strategy game in which you must conquer all the planets while rival AI players are trying to do the same!

The are currently four play modes:
Duel - battle an AI player for galactic supremacy!
Three Way - battle two AI players at once!
Cloaked - battle an AI player with invisible starships!
Asteroids - like Duel, but with moving planets that require a more dynamic strategy!
